```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}

meta_long <- metadata %>%
  select(10:23) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = everything(),
    names_to = "Variable",
    values_to = "Value"
  )

ggplot(meta_long, aes(y = Value)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~Variable, scales = "free") +
  theme_minimal()

```
